item.wait_researchAreas:
康乐乐 职称: 副教授 职位: 系别: 信息管理科学系
办公室: 314 邮箱: lelekang@nju.edu.cn 办公电话: 手机号码:
开放咨询时间: 每周三下午2:00-5:00
研究领域
电子商务(electronic Commerce)，电脑辅助沟通(computer-mediated communication)，开放式创新（open innovation）
教育背景
2011年10月－2015年09月，香港城市大学，管理学博士2009年09月－2011年06月，南京大学，硕士2005年09月－2009年06月，南京大学，学士
教学情况
南京大学信息管理学院研究生课程《知识社区与协同创新理论》，课程编号：120502D07，2018年秋季，逸C203，每周四上午1～2节南京大学信息管理学院研究生课程《网络分析研究》（合上），课程编号：1205B0300，2018年秋季，逸C306，每周四上午3～4节南京大学信息管理学院研究生课程《情报分析与研究》（合上），课程编号：125500C01，2018年秋季，仙2-115，每周五上午3~5节南京大学本科生导学课程《如何筛选网络信息——信息计量学视角》（合上）
科研项目
1. “移动应用开发团队的开放创新机理及实证研究”，国家自然科学基金（71704078），主持，2018-2021. 2. “移动互联时代团队创新模式研究”，江苏省社会科学基金，主持，2016-2018. 3. 中央高校基本科研业务费项目，主持，2017.
代表著作
1. 孙建军,闵学勤,康乐乐,裴雷,郑江淮等著.2016中国A股上市公司创新指数报告.北京:中国社会科学出版社.2016,11.ISBN: 978-7-5161-9287-0
代表论文
期刊论文7. Manli Wu, Xiaojuan Xu, Lele Kang*, J. Leon Zhao and Liang Liang. Accepted. "Encouraging People to Embrace Feedback-Seeking in Online Learning: An Investigation of Informational and Relational Drivers," Internet Research. SSCI & SCI. 6. Wenping Zhang, Lele Kang*, Qiqi Jiang, and Lei Pei. Accepted. "From Buzz to Bucks: The Impact of Social Media Opinions on the Locus of Innovation," Electronic Commerce Research and Applications. SSCI & SCI. 5. Jiaqi Yan, Kaixin Wang, Yi Liu, Kaiquan Xu*, Lele Kang, Xi Chen, and Hong Zhu. Forthcoming. "Mining Social Lending Motivations for Loan Project Recommendations," Expert Systems with Applications. SCI.4. Manli Wu, Lele Kang*, Yani Shi, J. Leon Zhao, and Liang Liang. Forthcoming. "Why People are Inovolved in and Committed to Online Knowledge-Sharing Communities: An Expectancy-Value Perspective", Journal of Global Information Management. SSCI. 3. Lele Kang,Qiqi Jiang*, and Chuan-Hoo Tan. 2016. "Remarkable Advocates: An Investigation of Geographic Distance and Social Capital for Crowdfunding", Information & Management, 54(3), pp. 336-348. SSCI & SCI.2. Lele Kang, Xiang Wang*, Chuan-Hoo Tan, and J. Leon Zhao. 2015. "Understanding the Antecedents and Consequences of Live-Chat Use in E-Commerce Markets", Journal of Organizational Computing and Electronic Commerce, 25(2), pp. 117-139. SCI1. Shaokun Fan, Lele Kang*, and J. Leon Zhao. 2015. "Workflow-aware Attention Tracking to Enhance Collaboration Management", Information Systems Frontiers, 17(6), pp. 1253-1264. SCI.部分会议论文13. Lele Kang, Chuan-Hoo Tan, and J. Leon Zhao, "Organizational Quest for Competitive Advantage through Innovation: Where Should IT Capability be Focused?" Twenty-Second Pacific Asia Conference on Information Systems (PACIS2018), Japan 2018.12. Qiqi Jiang, and Lele Kang, "'Know' Your Mobile Customers: A Design Approach to An Android-Based Mobile Analytics Tool," Twenty-Second Pacific Asia Conference on Information Systems (PACIS2018), Japan 2018.11. Wenping Zhang, Lele Kang, Qiqi Jiang, and Yiyang Bian, "More than the Tone: The Impact of Social Media Opinions on Innovation Investments," Twenty-Sixth European Conference on Information Systems (ECIS2018), Portsmouth, UK, 2018.10. Manli Wu, Lele Kang, Xuan Li, and J. Leon Zhao, "Participation in Open Knowledge-Sharing Community: Expectancy Value Perspective," International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (HCII 2016).9. Lele Kang, Shaokun Fan, and J. Leon Zhao, “The Design of IdeaWorks: Applying Social Learning Network to Support Tertiary Education,” International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (HCII 2015), Los Angeles, USA, June 2015.8. Qiqi Jiang, Jianjun Qin, and Lele Kang, “A Literature Review for Open Source Software Studies,” International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (HCII 2015), Los Angeles, USA, June 2015.7. Qiqi Jaing, and Lele Kang, “Investigating the Success of Crowdfunding Project from Social Media Perspective,” The 2014 International Workshop on Big Data Commerce (BDC 2014), Shenzhen, China, Dec. 2014.6. Lele Kang, Xiang Wang, Chuan-Hoo Tan, J. Leon Zhao, “Understanding the Antecedents and Consequences of Live-Chat Use in E-Commerce Context,” International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (HCII 2014), Crete, Greece, June 2014. 最佳论文奖 in HCI in Business. 5. J. Leon Zhao, Lele Kang, and Shaokun Fan, “Exploring Impact of Awareness on Virtual Learning Team,” International Conference on Education Reform and Management Innovation (ERMI 2013), Jeju Island, Korea, Dec. 2013.4. Lele Kang, Chuan-Hoo Tan, and J. Leon Zhao, “The Impact of Intra-Transaction Communication on Customer Purchase Behaviour in E-Commerce Context,” Australasian Conference in Information Systems (ACIS 2013), Melbourne, Australia, Dec. 2013.3. Qingqing Bi and Lele Kang, “Influences of E-Retailer Sponsored Virtual Community on Consumer Loyalty: An Exploration of Underlying Mechanisms,” Pacific Asia Conference on Information Systems (PACIS 2013), Jeju Island, Korea, June 2013.2. Shaokun Fan, Lele Kang, and J. Leon Zhao, “Exploring Impact of Attention Awareness on Collaboration Performance in Virtual Teams,” SIGBPS Workshop on Business Processes and Services (BPS 2012), Orlando, Florida, USA, Dec. 2012.1. Lele Kang, Xiang Wang, Xue Yang, and Chuan-Hoo Tan, “Enhancing Organization's Operational Efficiency through Environmental Performance Improvement: A Resource-Based View of IT Resources,” China Summer Workshop on Information Management (CSWIM 2011), Harbin, China, June 2011.
奖项
最佳论文奖，HCI in Business, HCII 2014 Program, Crete, Greece优秀学术奖，香港城市大学
社会兼职
The 11th China Summer Workshop on Information Management (CSWIM2017), Publicity Co-ChairReviewer: Information & Management, Journal of Global Information Management, Electronic Commerce Research and Applications, ICIS, PACIS, etc.
